name: Bread
description: A simple loaf of bread, enough to stave off hunger for a day.

name: Fish Oil Package
description: A small package containing fish oil, wrapped carefully for delivery.

name: Medicine Package
description: Urgent medicine for Martha's sick daughter. Handle with care.

name: Letter Satchel
description: A professional courier's satchel, provided by your patron. Increases letter carrying capacity.

name: Fine Clothes
description: Elegant attire suitable for formal occasions. Opens doors to noble society.

name: Merchant Ledger
description: A well-organized ledger for tracking business deals. Essential for trade relationships.

name: Local Ale Set
description: A collection of local brews perfect for sharing. Enhances bonds with common folk.

name: Mysterious Gold-Sealed Letter
description: An elegant letter sealed with gold wax, bearing an unfamiliar crest. The parchment feels expensive.
readableContent:
To the Bearer of this Letter,

Your recent activities have come to my attention. I represent certain interests that could benefit from someone of your... unique position and capabilities.

If you seek more than mere survival—if you desire purpose and proper compensation for your efforts—then I invite you to meet with my representative.

Seek out the private room at the Merchant's Rest tomorrow evening. Mention that you carry the golden seal.

Time is of the essence. This opportunity will not present itself again.

—A Friend
